Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.managers

Class VaultManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.core.managers.VaultManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEconomyManager, IPermissionsManager, IRestartable
@Singleton public final class VaultManager extends Object implements IRestartable, IEconomyManager, IPermissionsManager
Manages all interactions with Vault.
Author:
Pim

      public boolean buyStructure(IPlayer player, IWorld world, StructureType type, int blockCount)
      Description copied from interface: IEconomyManager
      Buys a structure for a player.
      Specified by:
      buyStructure in interface IEconomyManager
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose bank account to use.
      world - The world the structure is in.
      type - The StructureType of the structure.
      blockCount - The number of blocks in the structure.
      Returns:
      True if the player bought the structure successfully.

    • getMaxPermissionSuffix

      public OptionalInt getMaxPermissionSuffix(IPlayer player, String permissionBase)
      Description copied from interface: IPermissionsManager
      Gets the highest numerical permission suffix of the base permission node it can find, if any.

      For example, if a player has "permission.node.1" and "permission.node.2", this method would return (the OptionalInt of) 2.

      Specified by:
      getMaxPermissionSuffix in interface IPermissionsManager
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      permissionBase - The base permission. In the example above, this would be "permission.node." (note the '.' at the end).
      Returns:
      The highest numerical suffix of the base permission node if it exists, otherwise an empty OptionalInt.

    • hasPermission

      public boolean hasPermission(IPlayer player, String permissionNode)
      Description copied from interface: IPermissionsManager
      Checks if a player has a certain permission node or not.
      Specified by:
      hasPermission in interface IPermissionsManager
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      permissionNode - The permission node to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player has the permission node.

    • hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute

      public boolean hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute(IPlayer player, StructureAttribute structureAttribute)
      Description copied from interface: IPermissionsManager
      Checks if a player has bypass permissions for a specific attribute.

      Having bypass permissions means that a player is able to access a given attribute for structures even if they are not co-owners of those structures.

      Specified by:
      hasBypassPermissionsForAttribute in interface IPermissionsManager
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose permissions to check.
      structureAttribute - The attribute of the Structure for which to verify if the player has bypass permissions.
      Returns:
      True if the player has bypass permissions for the attribute.

    • isOp

      public boolean isOp(IPlayer player)
      Description copied from interface: IPermissionsManager
      Checks if the given player is a server operator or not.
      Specified by:
      isOp in interface IPermissionsManager
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player is a server operator on this server.
